description:
Our entry-level urban bike is made for commuting and travelling swiftly around town. Outfitted with hydraulic disc brakes the Midtown 2 has plenty of stopping power. If you're used to rim brakes, you'll feel the difference in immediately, and you'll really appreciate their performance on rainy days. With quality components, the Midtown is easy to maintain, and it's a reliable ride for getting from point A to point B. Outfit it with a rack and panniers and it will get you smoothly from point C to D as well. It's large-diameter wheels roll with more momentum than standard 26in. mountain bike wheels, and can handle bumps, dug-up pavement and unpaved side streets.

  • Lightweight aluminum frame uses butted tubing to keep it light
  • 700 x 38mm high-volume tires help smooth out rough roads and can handle dirt roads, paths and light trail use
  • Tektro hydraulic disc brakes are powerful in all weather conditions
  • Wide-ranging 9-speed microSHIFT and Shimano (Acera) drivetrain suits general city riding
  • Upright seated position and 15mm riser bars give you good visibility in traffic
  • Flat Wellgo pedals are easy to use in a wide rang of footwear, from business casual to flip-flops
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
  • MEC bikes are designed in Canada. Everything from the frames to the graphics were developed at the MEC Head Office in Vancouver, BC
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner.`
name: MEC Midtown 2 Bicycle - Unisex
